text: Malaa, Gideon ga haga duu dana gowaa hai tigidaumaha ang gi Dimaadua i golo, ga haga ingoo di maa bolo “Yihowah Shalom”6.24 “Yihowah Shalom” di ingoo deenei dono hadinga i nnelekai Hebrew boloo, “Dimaadua la go di Aumaalia.” (Di mee deenei le e duu hua igolo i Ophrah, tenua ni di madahaanau o Abiezer.)
